["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"软件源","children":"软件源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist"}],"，在文件的最顶端添加："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist","code":"Server = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/repo/$repo","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其余部分可以参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/archlinux/","children":"Arch Linux 帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"系统镜像","children":"系统镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["提供的镜像为 rootfs，可在目标目录中通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"tar xf"}]," 解压后使用。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/images/"}]]}]

meta.title: Arch Linux RISC-V 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
